attributes.action: Ensure the prosecution of Elliot Morley for fraud.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If any other normal person dishonestly claimed £16,000 they would face prosecution. Mr. Morley should be no exception!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
